title: tiruvazhundUr
sahitya:
anupallavi

A:  parivAi ranganAyaki maruvum jagannAyaka
 parivAi ranganAtha sarasija malarp-pAdA


caraNam    kaliyin koDumaiyAl nin karuNaittiram marandu
 kalaha vizhiyAr kAmakkaDal vIzhvEnai ATkoLLu
ulagu pugazh kAvEri nadiyin vaDa pAl IrEzh-
ulagai aLandu veNNai uNDu toNDar paravat-
